lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: I was traveling through east Africa a few years ago and had the chance to stay with a couple of NGO workers in a small village in western Kenya. I got to see first hand how much people can be helped with donations that seem like nothing to us.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: people trying to better themselves are  inspiring by their effort!  Although I cannot loan much at a time, I am grateful I am in a place in life that I may help and I am grateful for the spark of inspiration that the efforts of these entrepreneurs kindle in my own soul.
lenders.occupational_info:
I loan in honor of my family - those that came before me, my current family, and for all of those that will come after me!

I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do. 
Helen Keller

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: The people who want to borrow through Kiva are hard workers who just need a helping hand to support themselves, their children and families.  I respect that and I am proud to be a small part of that help.  The world needs more helping hands.
lenders.occupational_info: The hardest and most rewarding job I have is mother to a son with special needs.  I spent many years as a legal child advocate, representing abused or neglected children in court to protect them.

lenders.name: Eldon
lenders.loan_because:
in the words of  Samuel P. Putnam (1838-1896),he don't:

WHY DON'T HE LEND A HAND?

You say there is a God
Above the boundless sky,
A wise and wondrous deity
Whose strength none can defy
You say that he is seated
Upon a throne most grand,
Millions of angels at his beck . . .
Why don’t he lend a hand?

See how the earth is groaning,
What countless tears are shed,
See how the plague stalks forward
And brave and sweet lie dead.
Homes burn and hearts are breaking,
Grim murder stains the land;
You say he is omnipotent . . .
Why don’t he lend a hand?

Behold, injustice conquers;
Pain curses every hour;
The good and true and beautiful
Are trampled like the flower.
You say he is our father,
That what he wills doth stand;
If he is thus almighty
Why don’t he lend a hand?

What is this monarch doing
Upon his golden throne,
To right the wrong stupendous,
Give joy instead of moan?
With his resistless majesty,
Each force at his command,
Each law his own creation . . .
Why don’t he lend a hand?

Alas! I fear he’s sleeping,
Or is himself a dream,
A bubble on thought’s ocean,
Our fancy’s fading gleam.
We look in vain to find him
Upon his throne so grand,
Then turn your vision earthward,
‘Tis we must lend a hand.

‘Tis we must grasp the lightning,
And plow the rugged soil;
‘Tis we must beat back suffering,
And plague and murder foil;
‘Tis we must build the paradise
And bravely right the wrong;
The god above us faileth,
The god within is strong.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired from teaching law at the University of South Carolina Law School.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies make better, faster business decisions by making use of information they store in their computer databases.

lenders.loan_because: we like to help others.

lenders.name: Przemek
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I'm spending too much time in front of a computer

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinancing to improve the lives of hardworking people. I've been lucky to have been helped by other people in the past and know what a difference a little support can make. Kiva gives me the opportunity to help others in  return.
lenders.occupational_info: I track the number of people in my area who have a disease they can get from other people or animals. When more people are sick than usual, I help find out why and help stop other people from getting sick.

lenders.name: Joelyn K
lenders.loan_because: This is my tithe to justice in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach freshmen in college:  math calculations, pre-algebra, elementary algebra, and a math review course.

lenders.name: Jeanette and Logan
lenders.loan_because: Our heart's go out to the less fortunate and Iwe would like to help.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Just want to leave a better world to my children than the one I got from my parent…. Kiva is one way to make this happens.

lenders.name: mohammad
lenders.loan_because:
I have a dream to build a school.
I worked hard to bought the land,because my wife has a dream to have private school.
with this reason,
I joined in kiva.

I think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.

with this reason,
I joined in kiva.

I need much money to build my school,I hope kiva will help me to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach some private student to understand about computer and tecnology

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: It's great to be able to have an impact at a personal level with entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: rstanley
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people build something that may carry them forward. Teach a man to fish vs. give him a fish concept.
lenders.occupational_info: I am heavily involved in technology, business and the internet. I am happy to share any success and information that I may have with others. You must give in order to receive but giving is the rewarding part.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: everyone has the right to opportunity.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying Industrial Engineering at Georgia Tech and hope to go into a large international consulting firm upon graduation.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed and we actively care about others.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist the critically wounded and ill.

lenders.name: Kathleen and Mel
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I know how important credit is to grow a business.

lenders.name: Moein
lenders.loan_because: i know there are people who needs this money
lenders.occupational_info: just think about the happiness you can give to someone which is far more valuable than 25$ or more!

lenders.name: Debbie & Dan
lenders.loan_because: We have been extremely fortunate and wish to share our good fortune with others who show the initiative to provide for their families

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.occupation: working for a large investment bank
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: greasing the wheels of social-democracy or making rich people richer and poor people poorer. Depends on your take on the world!

lenders.name: shandy, Hans & Finley
lenders.loan_because: It makes me smile inside and out!

lenders.name: Mark Alcorn
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance can break poverty and provide hope.  It empowers people to be self reliant.  Microloans can have immediate impact on women and children enabling security, better health and education.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help hospitals find technology that prevent errors, improve processes and save lives.

I am Director of Missions at FUMC Coppell, TX
markjalcorn@gmail.com

lenders.name: Patrick and Lori
lenders.loan_because: we are blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Lori is a student working to improve people's health.  Patrick is working to make sure people who get sick can pay for it.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: I made money at a lemonade stand with my sister and now I want to help someone else with the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I go school.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: "To leave the world a bit better; whether by a healthy child, a garden patch, or a redeemed social condition. To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." -Ralph Waldo Emerson
lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel beautiful inside & out by treating their skin.  :)

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: The capacity to grow does not happen on its own. The benefit of one, enriches the lives of many. Together we do great things.
lenders.occupational_info: I think creatively about making technology useful for people.

lenders.name: Clyde
lenders.loan_because: it is my duty to give back to humanity...
lenders.occupational_info: helping others to be healthy through exercise, nutrition, emotional, and spiritual support...

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of household chores, plus our small farm while my husband goes to work.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I've lived in the developing world and was transformed by the people I met and worked with. This is a small way I can pay forward the gifts I received. I also want my daughters to learn about and connect with amazing people around the world who are doing amazing things with their lives and in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach businesspeople the skills to communicate with each other so they get more done, create richer relationships, and become their best selves at work and beyond.

lenders.name: Edrin
lenders.loan_because: Every enterpreneur in this world deserves a chance to get a kickstart which in turn makes their life better. Chances for to get a kickstart in business is more easier in my country than those countries such as Africa and others. Therefore helping those in need is what drives me to join Kiva.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs who need help to develop financial independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a business consultant for over 30 years: helping companies to become more profitable.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: everyone who can should be helping out those who can't.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting families and communities grow stronger and more caring

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and to honor my mother.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the mother of a high school age son who has a busy schedule.  I also volunteer as a child advocate in our local court system.

lenders.name: Robyn and James
lenders.occupational_info: We own a dance studio and fitness centre

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on the genetics of complex human traits and diseases.

lenders.name: Carley
lenders.loan_because: Doing just a little bit can help make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students how to position, take and also the science behind x-rays.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful idea. Helping people help themselves is the way to make them self-sufficient and feeling good about themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help our customers implement our software so they get the best benefit from it.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Giving kids who otherwise have nothing to grow up with an aspiration of quality in their lives.

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a fair chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach grade 3 students.  They are 7 and 8 years old.  They're happy and curious and excited about learning.  They keep me going!

lenders.name: jamesaubrey
lenders.loan_because: people who are willing to work their way out of poverty need to know it's not a futile effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Roman Catholic priest serving in the Archdiocese of Oklahoma City.  I am also an attorney with an interest in immigration law and policy.
